summary:
You are a criminal and a mysterious stranger.  Can you who came through the crisis in the Helgen somehow survive in Skyrim?  
A story for life and death begins now...
descriptionHtml:
Name: Embattled Dovakin
Version: 1.1
Date: 11/04/2012
Author: m0m

Description
===========
 Will you who were arrested to cross the border illegally be accepted so easily by the people of the Skyrim?
No! You are a criminal and a mysterious stranger.
Can you who came through the crisis in the Helgen somehow survive in Skyrim?
A story for life and death begins now...

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
* In order to enjoy this MOD, please use my save data at optional files. 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Load save data, then use console command \"showracemenu\" for character making.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

+ It is overhaul MOD which I made in response to the voice \"more difficult more\".
+ Since the pleasure to experience is lost, I do not write the change.
+ The fun is reduced to half when you use the high-performance weapons, equipments, magics, items, followers.
  (Does an arrested low level criminal have such things from the beginning? Isn\'t it wrong that you who are not a blacksmith, either can make the high-performance weapons or equipments?)
+ I do not recommend use of this MOD to those who wants to complete quests in sequence.
+ You can enjoy this MOD more, if you introduce the enemy increase MOD.

When you introduce my \"Valuable Foods and Misc\", your life may become a little easy.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13058

When you introduce McGuffin\'s \"Camping Lite\", you can indulge in loneliness more.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11526

Have fun!


Install
=======
Simply extract to the ..\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\ folder.
Then, enable \"Embattled Dovakin.esp\" in the Skyrim launcher.
Please set the road order if possible towards the last.


Uninstall
=========
Simply delete following file.
\"..\\Skyrim\\Data\\Embattled Dovakin.esp\"


Release Info
============
v1.0 (10/04/2011) - Initial release
v1.1 (11/04/2011) - Readme changed
